description:
METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED PRIVATE PARADISE!
This immaculate home situated on over an acre of magnificent gardens is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. The home features 3 bedrooms, the master bedroom with a walk in robe & ensuite for convenience. The spacious formal lounge is located adjacent to the formal dining area with direct access to the verandah overlooking the peaceful gardens the perfect place to relax or entertain. The spacious open plan kitchen/living area with pitched ceiling & Celestine windows, which let in an abundance of natural light, has a gas log heater for added ambience, whilst the home has mains GDH throughout for comfort & convenience. The well-appointed, contemporary kitchen features a gas stove & electric oven, a dishwasher & plenty of cupboard & bench space. Outside there is a double carport, a convenient circular drive, a garden shed, a huge veggie patch, meandering garden paths, a workshop & heaps of storage space. Add to this solar hot water & all mains services within minutes of Cockatoo. What more could you want?
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

ALL OFFERS INVITED!!
The vendor is offering to pay legals for the purchaser too!
Over 3/4 of an acre of land that has had a previous planning permit approved, this block is located only a short distance to Cockatoo sports complex and is surrounded by nature and nice homes.
The Power is connected, with all services available and a driveway already cut.
Capitalise on the grant if you are a first home buyer for building a new home.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 to view the section 32 and permit or arrange your inspection
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Spread Your Wings On 1/2 An Acre
Set in one of Cockatoos finest locations, this superb north facing double brick home is the perfect family property and offers 4 bedrooms, BIR master with full ensuite and passive solar design. Walking through the front door you are immediately hit with a sense of homeliness with a duel open fire place, gas heating and two separate living areas for both formal and informal living.
A well appointed central kitchen is sure to impress the chef in the family. The backyard features an outdoor entertaining area with a spa, large lawn area for the kids & family pets as well as a 4 car carport with sealed driveway. There is also the massive bonus of a separate home office and large indoor games room/ man cave with undercover access, internet & phone connections available & a wood heater. This home is sure to impress, Inspect Today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

RENOVATED & READY TO MOVE IN, RELAX & ENJOY!
Privately located amongst fully fenced, landscaped gardens on just under a quarter of an acre this renovated, low maintenance 3 bedroom home is an easy walk to public transport, the Cockatoo Sports Ground & Cockatoo central. The home features 2 spacious living areas, the main with an ambient gas log heater & split system for added convenience & heaps of windows to take in the relaxing bush views. The renovated kitchen offers stainless steel dishwasher & stove & the main bathroom has contemporary style with floor to ceiling tiling & all new fittings. Outside there is a large, undercover entertaining area overlooking the landscaped gardens, a spacious garden shed with concrete floor and power, a generous lawned area, a cubby & all securely & privately fenced for the kids & animals to play safely. This neat & tidy home represents the ideal opportunity to get out of the rental rate race or maybe start your investment portfolio!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

A GREAT HOME FOR HORSE ENTHUSIASTS!
Opportunities like this one dont come along too often! Over 4 acres, private court location, 5 paddocks with electric fencing and town water, hot and cold wash area, a 70ft work arena and all in walking distance to the local pony club! The house is large enough for the whole family with 4 bedrooms, master with huge walk in robe and full ensuite, lounge with cozy wood fire and the luxury of natural gas ducted heating throughout and a second living room for the kids to escape to. The kitchen/meals area opens to a great undercover decked area overlooking your paddocks and the distant hills and the property also sports several sheds with power and concrete flooring, a dog run that will be the envy of all pooches and extra under house storage to keep more toys. All in all, this is a great property at a ripper price. Dont delay your inspection on this one.

WATCH PUFFING BILLY FROM YOUR DOORSTEP!
Offering a view of Puffing Billy as it chugs by & literally a few hundred meters walk to the centre of Cockatoo, the takeaways, restaurants, post office & public transport & a stone's throw from Cockatoo Primary School, this classic mud brick on a quarter of an acre offers privacy & the charm of the Hills. The home flows over 3 levels & offers 3 spacious bedrooms, a stylish slate bathroom, functional laundry & modern kitchen with a free standing 900mm stainless steel stove. The large open plan lounge & dining area continues the warm feel of the home with a toasty wood heater & has direct access to the undercover outdoor entertaining area set amongst the low maintenance gardens. Featuring slate floors, soaring timber ceilings, a unique stained glass window, the artistic use of bricks throughout & an abundance of windows to let in plenty of natural light, this home has character aplenty. Add to this the convenience of gas heating & ceiling fans for comfort, mains water & a water tank for the garden. Outside there is a double lock up garage with concrete floor, a chook pen & wide verandahs under the roof line, ideal for entertaining. Don't hesitate to secure your piece of the Hills!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Solid Brick Veneer on 1/4 acre (approx)
This neat and tidy brick home has plenty of potential and is located only moments from schools, shops, public transport and everything that the quiet hills township of Cockatoo offers yet is positioned in a private and quiet street. The home boasts 3 spacious bedrooms, sun filled lounge room, an adjoining kitchen and meals area featuring a modern stainless steel stove and oven . All of this sits perfectly on just under a 1/4 of an acre (979m2 approx) offering a sealed drive with plenty of parking space, plus garden shed.
Don't delay as this home will be sold!
Call Mick Dolphin today on 0429684522 to arrange your inspection today!
Terms 10% deposit with balance on settlement in 30/45 days.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

ROOM TO SPREAD YOUR WINGS!
This spacious 4 bedroom family home with dual access from a sealed road is situated on a beautiful three quarters of an acre walking distance to public transport & Cockatoo & its shops, eateries & the primary school. This solid, brick home features 4 bedrooms, the Master with an ensuite with a double shower & a spacious family bathroom with a spa. The large lounge room offers a toasty wood heater to warm the home & is adjacent to the open plan timber kitchen with a combustion stove for the budding chef, plenty of natural light & an abundance of cupboard & bench space & overlooks the family dining space. To add to the conveniences there are mains connected gas lamps in the kitchen & hallway to ensure you will not be left in the dark the next time the power goes out. Outside you will find a large undercover, paved entertaining area, a 6m x 10m shed with concrete floor, power & a toilet, various fruit trees, a double carport & a chook run. If things like sealed road, dual access, big shed, spacious home, close to town & large block are sparking your interest call to arrange a private inspection today!

Light, Bright & Spacious Family Home
This neat and tidy cedar weatherboard home offers the perfect 'Hills' lifestyle. The home offers 3 bedrooms, 3 light filled living areas, a stunning modern hostess kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and an updated main bathroom. The home has all the extras you could ask for like a fresh modern colour scheme throughout, polished timber floors, GDH & split level living. Two large decked entertaining areas that are a great place to sit back & enjoy the fresh country air. Special features include split system heating and cooling, solar panels and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through.
Outside you will find a fully fenced rear yard & a useable 1/4 acre (approx.) block with plenty of room for your four legged friends & kids to play.
If you are looking for a quality home in the hills then look no further.
Call today to inspect!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

IDEAL BUILDING BLOCK!
* Generous 1/3ACRE+ cleared land
* Mains water, power, gas & phone available
* Gentle slope
* Quiet location
* Ready to build you dream home! (STCA)

IDEAL ENTRY INTO THE PROPERTY MARKET!
This neat 3 bedroom western red cedar home is ideally located on just under a third of an acre just a short walk from public transport, the Cockatoo Primary School, the local shops, take-aways & restaurants. The home features 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes & a functional bathroom with separate toilet. The timber kitchen offers a stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm gas stove & convenient walk in pantry & sits adjacent to the huge dining room & formal lounge with vaulted timber ceilings & toasty wood heater for those cold winters nights. The home also features a large rumpus room at one end of the home, ideal for the kids to do their own thing. Add to this mains gas ducted heating for added comfort & convenience & a split system for the warmer days, as well as mains water connected & sewer available & this property is offering an excellent first home or investment opportunity!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

SOLID 5 BEDROOM FAMILY HOME ON HALF AN ACRE!
Situated on a flat half acre with a fully fenced rear yard & only a short walk to the centre of Cockatoo, the shops & primary school, this solid family home features enough room for the largest of families with 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & 2 living areas. Offering zoned living the Master Bedroom is located at the front of the home & has triple robes & an ensuite with spa. The remaining 4 bedrooms all have built in robes & floor to ceiling windows that let in heaps of natural light. The well-appointed kitchen has solid timber bench top, stainless steel appliances, heaps of space & overlooks the huge, undercover outdoor entertaining area, ideal for the big family gatherings all year round. Add to this a wood heater & mains gas console for year round warmth, a double carport, a wood shed, a 9m x 6m shed with concrete floor & power & a sealed drive. Such comfortable & affordable homes for the larger family do not come along often.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Your Lifestyle Property awaits...
Whether you love bikes, ponies or are craving more room for your family the dream of owning small acreage is now within reach.
A gently sloped clear block with a little bit of bush at the rear of the property.
As you enter the property you are welcomed by an orchard with an established collection of citrus and nut trees.
Then you arrive at a flat open area with plenty of space for parking that spare trailer, float, boat or whatever your heart desires.
The existing timber dwelling has underground power ready to use with a new power board, a mains water tap and a permit available to begin restumping.
There is mains gas at the gate. Surrounding the house is a collection of old sheds and one lock up garage with concrete floor.
The open grassy, well drained space behind the house is perfect for ponies or pets with some established trees and mains water taps ready for use.
You are close to the heart of horse country being only 4 kms from Macclesfield Pony Club. You are also close to the township of Cockatoo or Emerald with many schools, facilities, sporting and community groups.
Mick Dolphin : 0429 684 522

Brick Family Home On A 1/4 Acre (approx.)
Perfectly positioned on the high side of the road is this lovely low maintenance brick home that offer plenty of space for you to enjoy your hills lifestyle. Sitting perfectly on a 1/4 of an acre (approx.) the home features a large open plan lounge & dining area, kitchen with plenty of storage, gas ducted heating, 3 large bedrooms, timber floors and much more. Outside you will discover a single carport, terraced backyard and plenty of lawn areas and plenty of off street parking. Call today this one won't last!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

4 BEDROOM + STUDY CHARACTER HOME IN COCKATOO!
This elegant family home is located on a third of an acre in a quiet leafy street just a stone's throw from Cockatoo, the shops, cafes & the primary school. Oozing charm & character from the moment you enter the drive this 2 storey weatherboard home features a Master with walk in robe & ensuite downstairs, along with a spacious formal lounge & dining room, a 2nd living area & modern, well-appointed, timber kitchen with dishwasher & access to a large & private decked entertaining area. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms with pitched ceilings & built in robes, an eclectic study & a modern family bathroom. Add to the comforts mains gas ducted heating, a split system to keep you cool in the warmer months, mains water & a convenient 3rd toilet for guests on the lower level. Outside you will find landscaped gardens, a shed, plenty of under house storage, a water tank & a sealed drive, all fully fenced for the kids & their furry friends. If you are seeking privacy, space & the character only found in the Hills you best put this property on your list to inspect. You will not be disappointed!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Absolute Privacy On 3.5 Acres (approx)
Set in a peaceful and private location with only nature as your neighbour is this spacious 3 bedroom family home that offers plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy.
Featuring multiple living areas with floor to ceiling windows throughout that allow you to enjoy a beautiful view of the surrounding gardens and bushlands
allowing natural light to brighten and fill the home, large timber kitchen offering electric cooking, plenty of cupboards space & room to move. The home also offers a walk through study, coonara for the winter months, reverse cycle Air Conditioning to three areas and one area cooling only, alfresco entertaining area, sweeping verandahs and polished timber floors. The main bedroom is roomy with an ensuite. Outside you will discover 3.5 acres of complete privacy, a sealed drive, established gardens, a car garage and adjoining carport space plus further carport for two vehicles, 2 garden sheds and much more. To enjoy this rare and unique home on this magnificent property with bush surroundings call today!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE!
You are sure to be impressed by this extensive property on just over 3 acres walking distance to Cockatoo & just a few minutes from Emerald. The home is set back from the sealed road amongst the parklike grounds, complete with a dam (with pump) & landscaped gardens. The home features 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, a 2nd living area with a split system for added comfort & a huge, open plan kitchen, dining, living area with feature open fire place & direct access to the equally large undercover deck, ideal for entertaining the masses. The well-appointed kitchen offers gas cooking, a dishwasher, Ceaser Stone bench tops & plenty of space throughout & overlooks the spacious dining area where you could fit the largest of family tables. Inside there is also a study, convenient powder room, big laundry & the home has mains Gas Ducted Heating for the ultimate in comfort through the colder months. Outside there is a gorgeous salt water, solar heated in ground swimming pool with a large cabana for entertaining & an outdoor kitchen where you can laze away the summer with family & friends & there is an outdoor bathroom to add to the conveniences. Dont stop there the property also features arguably one of the largest sheds on the mountain being 17m wide x 26m long x 6m high with concrete floor, power, phone, a toilet & contemporary office/accommodation on the mezzanine level. You've seen the photos & watched the video now grab the opportunity to see it up close. You will not be disappointed!

ONLY 1 LOT LEFT - WALK TO TOWN!
* 1 block left
* #1 - SOLD!
* #2 is 895 sqm - Offers Considered Over $165,000
* Walking distance to Cockatoo, shops, transport & the Primary school
* Partially established gardens/trees
* All services available
* Private location
* Flat blocks, ideal for building the dream (STCA)
*A unique & rare opportunity call to inspect today!

Vendor says it's time to SELL...MAKE US AN OFFER!
Located within a short stroll to the town, school, forest walks & transport, this 1/4 acre allotment offers the perfect opportunity to build your dream home in an excellent location. Boasting established trees and tree top views, you can build your new home in a rural setting with a convenient lifestyle (house plans have been drawn up and are available).
All services are available - hurry this is one not to be missed!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

RENOVATE & REAP THE REWARDS!
Don't miss the opportunity to jump into the property market with this 4 bedroom, 1 bathroom weatherboard home under 2km from Cockatoo & a short walk to public transport. The home has 4 spacious bedrooms, a large open plan lounge/kitchen/dining area, a family bathroom, laundry & plenty of space & scope to renovate. There is mains gas ducted heating, timber floors, some rewiring has been completed & mains water is connected. The property has dual access & entry can conveniently be gained through the lane way at the rear. In the rear yard of this quarter acre block there is a double lock up garage with concrete floor & power & a cute cubby for the kids as well as room for them to play. Properties like this are rare & this little gem will NOT last long!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Country Home With Huge Garage
Situated in a private, quiet hills location is this unique home on a large totally usable allotment of 1/3 of an acre. The home offers 2 large bedrooms, large main bathroom with spa bath, spacious open plan living areas consisting of kitchen/meals area and an adjoining comfortable lounge room with coonara heating, Gas ducted heating and split system, there is also space for an open study nook.
The cottage style gardens are low maintenance with a great rear under cover patio area ideal for entertaining and a HUGE 4 car garage with remote door and an separate internal room and wood/storage shed around behind the shed, outside you will also find a separate paddock, containing vegie garden, chook run, small stables and storage shed. This unique property promises a cosy, family haven while being close to all amenities. Call today this one won't last!!
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781
